borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: (See 2023/00057/TPO for TPO trees)T5. T6. T7. London Planes. Internal lawn. Crown clean (remove deadwood, crossing and hazardous branches). Crown thin canopy density by 15% via removal of epicormic growth.T8. Lime. Iffley Road, adjacent to school keepers house.  Crown clean (remove deadwood, crossing and hazardous branches). Crown thin canopy density by 20% via removal of epicormic growth.T13. T14. T15. T16. Lime. Glenthorne Road frontage.  Crown lift over road to 5m. Crown thin canopy density by 20% via removal of epicormic growth.T20. London Plane. Glenthorne Road frontage.  Remove epicormic growth from stem. Crown clean (remove deadwood, crossing and hazardous branches).T23. London Plane. Cambridge Grove.  Crown lift over road to 5m. Reduce canopy back from Church building to give 3m clearance. Remove deadwood and hazardous branches.T29. Hawthorn. Playing fields.  Dead tree. Fell to ground level.T33. London Plane. Playing fields.  Diseased tree. Fell to ground level.T34. Hawthorn. Playing fields.  Crown clean (remove deadwood, crossing and hazardous branches).T35. London Plane. Playing fields.  Decay fungus present on main stem. Crown reduce by 3m in height and 3m in lateral spread (to previous points) Retain natural form of tree.T36. London Plane. Playing fields.  Crown clean (remove deadwood, crossing and hazardous branches). Crown thin canopy density by 20% via removal of epicormic growth.T37. Wild Cherry. Playing fields.  Crown lift by 2.5mT40. T42. London Plane. Tennis courts.  Previously reduced, dense regrowth. Crown thin canopy density by 25% via removal of regrowth. Remove epicormic growth from trunk.T41. Hawthorn.Tennis courts.  Crown clean (remove deadwood, crossing and hazardous branches).
